introduction.p1: I'm Jessica Hvirfvel - a creative, logical thinker with a passion for crafting, organizing, and problem-solving. I'm driven by a desire to learn and understand how things work together. I've long been interested in IT and graphic design but wasn't sure how to pursue it. That changed in 2020 when my sister introduced me to HTML and CSS, and from that moment on, I was sold.
introduction.p2: Fast forward to today, I hold a Degree of Bachelor of Science (180 credits) in Information Systems from Karlstads University, where I attended the Web development program, and I'm fully interested in fullstack development!

funfacts.fact: Give me an unopened package from Ikea and I will happily assemble it
I've been backpacking for approx. 1.5 years in Southeast Asia och Europe
I've been responsible for a two-week long event for 250 people
I've parachuted from a height of 4000 meters
I've received a diploma for my graphical contribution in my student association
I'm great at puzzles and never stop until every piece is perfectly in place

currentlyA: What are fun facts without photo evidence? Take a look at the gallery!
currentlyB: What am I doing in my free time, you ask? Well, right now, I'm currently working on improving this portfolio and a Jeopardy inspired game, both using React. In addition, I expands my knowledge through online courses. How fun!
